examples.translation: Step after step, I chased it, I couldn’t find its trace

examples.text:
Kaçma, kovalamam
Senin gibisini çok, çok, çok gördüm
Affedemem, hayır
Sesin gelmiyo' hiç yok, yok, yok bye bye
examples.translation:
Don't run, I won't chase
I've seen more like you, you, you
No, I can't forgive
Your voice doesn't come.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish قوغالامق (kovalamak). By surface analysis, kova + -la.
